## PackageManager.shrinkwrapFilename property

The filename of the shrinkwrap file that is used by the package manager.

**Signature:**

```typescript
readonly shrinkwrapFilename: string;
```

## Remarks

Example: `npm-shrinkwrap.json` or `pnpm-lock.yaml`
